tool_description: Configures monitoring for domain availability, expiration alerts, and changes for strategic domain acquisition opportunities.

monitor_types.description: Types of monitoring: availability, expiration, whois_changes, dns_changes

alert_threshold_days.description: Days before expiration to send alerts

include_similar_domains.description: Whether to monitor similar domain variations

error_messages: Invalid domain list: Provide 1-100 valid domain names to monitor.
Invalid monitor types: Use valid monitoring types (availability, expiration, whois_changes, dns_changes).
Invalid alert threshold: Must be between 1 and 365 days.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address for notifications.
Monitoring limit reached: Cannot monitor more domains with current subscription.
usage: Provide domains_to_monitor and monitor_types to set up domain monitoring. Configure check_frequency, alert_threshold_days, and notification preferences for automated tracking.

monitoring_id.description: Unique identifier for this monitoring configuration

domains_added.description: Number of domains successfully added to monitoring

next_check_time.description: When the next monitoring check will occur

alert_configuration.description: Summary of alert settings and notification preferences
